Hello! I'm Alexandra Goh, a Master's student in Business Analytics at Monash University. 

I'm passionate about using data to drive insights, and this blog is a space where I explore data communication for my course. 

___________________________________________________________________________________________

This is a blog for the ETC5523 Communicating with Data assessment at Monash University. The main purpose of this blog and the dataset(s) used are merely for educational purposes only.
